title: China supersizes pig farms in world's top pork market
text:
China supersizes pig farms in world's top pork market 6:33am EST - 01:39 
A record number of large-scale pig farms are expected to built in China this year as it shifts a big chunk of its pork production from backyard pig pens to automated, intensive hog barns of the kind widely used in the United States. As David Pollard reprots, the shift may already have seen billions of dollars of new investment. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript
